name: Towerena
description:
Power up towers with cubes to defeat enemies.  Energy of cubes decays over time if installed in towers. You can buy new cubes or additional towers at shops inside the arena.

Once all enemies are defeated, the gate for the arena below opens.

Types of cube

  • Curative: cures the player and towers in the surrounding area
  • Offensive: can grant 1, 2 or 4 turrets at the tower and the ability to shoot through them randomly, one by one or all simultaneously

Keymap

  • WASD - Move character
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Mouse button - Shoot
  • E - Interact with cubes and shops
  • R - Release cube
  • ESC - Return to the start menu
